keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Haragi Performance
keyMoments.description: Luffy entertains the Kuja warriors at a banquet using his Gomu Gomu no Haragi (Belly Talk) technique, inflating his belly and making it dance.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's ability to connect with people through humor and shows his integration into Kuja society.

keyMoments.title: Learning of Ace's Execution
keyMoments.description: Luffy learns from Nyon that his brother Ace is scheduled to be executed at Marineford in five days, captured by Blackbeard.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation completely changes Luffy's journey and motivates the Impel Down arc.
keyMoments.quote: Ace's execution is in five days at Marineford!

keyMoments.title: Decision to Rescue Ace
keyMoments.description: Luffy decides to abandon his plan to reunite with his crew and instead go directly to Impel Down to rescue Ace before the execution.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering loyalty to family over his own goals and crew reunion.
keyMoments.quote: I'm sorry, everyone. I have to save Ace!

keyMoments.title: Accepting Hancock's Past
keyMoments.description: After Hancock shares her traumatic past of enslavement by Celestial Dragons, Luffy responds with understanding and acceptance, stating he only hates the Celestial Dragons.
keyMoments.significance: Deepens the trust between Luffy and Hancock and shows Luffy's compassionate nature.
keyMoments.quote: The only ones I hate are the Celestial Dragons, not you.

abilities.description: Luffy inflates his belly, draws a face on it, and makes it dance. A comedic entertainment technique rather than a combat move. In the Funimation dub, it's called Gum-Gum Belly Talk.

relationships.description: Hancock falls in love with Luffy after he accepts her traumatic past without judgment. Luffy trusts her to help him reach Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy accepts Hancock's past of enslavement by Celestial Dragons, stating he only hates the Celestial Dragons, not her. This deepens Hancock's feelings for him.

relationships.description: Nyon informs Luffy about Ace's execution and helps devise the plan to reach Impel Down via Hancock's Marine ship.

evolutionMoments.description: Nyon reveals critical information about Ace's execution and guides Luffy on how to reach Impel Down in time.

reveals.information: First use of Gomu Gomu no Haragi (Belly Talk) technique
Chooses to rescue Ace from Impel Down before reuniting with his crew

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Shichibukai
keyMoments.description: Nyon reveals to Luffy that Hancock holds the rank of Shichibukai (Warlord of the Sea), explaining her power and authority.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hancock's official position and explains how she can help Luffy reach Impel Down.

keyMoments.title: Contracts Love Sickness
keyMoments.description: After Luffy announces his departure, Hancock experiences love sickness symptoms - blushing, crying uncontrollably, and collapsing in pain.
keyMoments.significance: First time Hancock has fallen in love. This disease has killed previous Amazon Lily empresses.

keyMoments.title: Shares Her Traumatic Past with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Hancock tells Luffy about her enslavement by Celestial Dragons when she was 12, the slave marks on her back, and her rescue by Fisher Tiger after four years of suffering.
keyMoments.significance: This confession represents complete trust in Luffy and reveals the trauma behind her hatred of men.

keyMoments.title: Agrees to Help Luffy Reach Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Despite her illness, Hancock agrees to accept the Marines' summons and smuggle Luffy aboard to help him reach Impel Down in time to save Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Solidifies Hancock's devotion to Luffy and enables the Impel Down arc. By leaving with Luffy, she unknowingly cures her love sickness.

relationships.description: Hancock falls deeply in love with Luffy after he accepts her traumatic past without judgment. She develops love sickness and agrees to help him reach Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock contracts love sickness after Luffy announces his departure. She shares her deepest secret with him and agrees to risk everything to help him.

reveals.information: Revealed to be one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea (Shichibukai)
Contracts love sickness, a disease that has killed previous Amazon Lily empresses
Shares the full story of her enslavement by Celestial Dragons with Luffy

keyMoments.title: Reveals Hancock's Shichibukai Status
keyMoments.description: Nyon informs Luffy that Hancock is one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, explaining her authority and power.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial information that sets up the plan to reach Impel Down.
keyMoments.quote: Hancock is one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, a Shichibukai.

keyMoments.title: Announces the Marines' War Preparations
keyMoments.description: Nyon reads from a newspaper that the Marines have summoned all Shichibukai for an all-out offensive against Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the impending Summit War that will shake the world.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Ace's Scheduled Execution
keyMoments.description: Nyon tells Luffy that Ace will be executed at Marineford in five days and that Blackbeard was responsible for his capture.
keyMoments.significance: The revelation that changes Luffy's entire journey and drives the next two arcs.
keyMoments.quote: Ace's execution is in five days at Marineford!

keyMoments.title: Explains the History of Love Sickness
keyMoments.description: Nyon reveals the tragic history of Amazon Lily's previous empresses who died from love sickness after falling in love but being unable to be with their beloveds.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial context for the danger Hancock faces and the cure (leaving with her beloved).
keyMoments.quote: All the previous empresses fell in love but had to stay on the island. The pain from not being with their loved ones caused them to die.

relationships.description: Nyon serves as an advisor to Hancock and understands her love sickness, trying to save her life.
Nyon provides critical information to Luffy about Ace's execution and helps devise the plan to reach Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Nyon reveals the situation with Ace and guides Luffy on how to save him.

reveals.information: Reveals the history of love sickness and previous Amazon Lily empresses who died from it

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Execution Announcement
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Ace is scheduled to be executed at Marineford in five days, captured by Blackbeard and imprisoned in Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the entire Impel Down and Marineford arcs. The Marines plan to use Ace as bait to lure out Whitebeard.

reveals.information: Scheduled to be executed at Marineford in five days, currently imprisoned in Impel Down
Captured by Blackbeard and turned over to the Marines
